description: Add nested `Design` and `Preview` tabs inside `Visual` mode in `InvoiceTemplateEditor`
Preserve existing top-level `Visual` and `Code` editor behavior while adding preview workflow
Add preview session state model including compile/render/verify lifecycle statuses
Support preview data source toggle between `Sample` and `Existing`
Provide curated sample invoice scenarios for preview without requiring existing invoices
Implement existing-invoice searchable selector backed by tenant-scoped invoice queries
Fetch selected existing invoice details and normalize to renderer input model
Introduce GUI designer IR extraction from workspace nodes as compiler input
Implement deterministic AssemblyScript code generation from GUI IR
Generate field/table/totals binding logic in AssemblyScript output from GUI metadata
Generate layout/style logic in AssemblyScript output from GUI layout constraints
Emit compiler source maps/diagnostics metadata linking GUI nodes to generated AssemblyScript segments
Add transient compile action for preview that uses same AssemblyScript compiler options/path as production template compilation
Implement compile cache keyed by generated source hash to avoid redundant compilation
Surface structured compile errors and warnings in preview UI
Ensure preview compile path is side-effect free and does not write templates/invoices
Render preview via real invoice rendering runtime (Wasm execution + HTML/CSS render path)
Disallow designer-canvas placeholder renderer as authoritative preview output
Debounce preview compile+render pipeline while editing
Add manual re-run action for compile/render/verification in preview
Implement loading, empty, and error UI states for data load, compile, render, and verification phases
Keep preview read-only with no drag/drop/resize/selection mutations
Derive expected layout constraints from GUI design state for verification
Collect rendered HTML layout geometry from authoritative preview output
Implement layout comparator with tolerance rules to detect mismatches between expected design constraints and rendered geometry
Display verification summary and mismatch details within preview UI
Expose explicit preview verification status (pass/issues) for current design+data selection
Ensure save flow persists compiler-generated AssemblyScript/Wasm logic used by preview
Define and enforce GUI vs Code source-of-truth behavior for GUI-authored templates
Preserve designer workspace hydration/reset and unsaved state while running authoritative preview
Add stable automation IDs for preview controls, status indicators, and verification report elements
Add unit tests for IR extraction and deterministic AssemblyScript code generation
Add integration tests for preview compile+render parity with real invoice rendering runtime
Add verification tests for layout comparator pass/fail behavior across known design fixtures
Add end-to-end tests for design -> preview -> verify -> save flow
Update billing template documentation to describe authoritative preview compiler pipeline and layout verification behavior
